alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 7:36PM EST until December 14 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 815 PM EST. * At 735 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 14 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 17 miles north of Apalachicola, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Liberty and north central Franklin Counties, including the following locations... East Camp, Poplar Camp, Kern, Wilma, Vilas, Sumatra, Jensen Place, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole and Central City. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
